FuncDef: This command configures values for the update, timeout and flush RIP timers.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the RIP update timer value in seconds expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 600.
Specifies the RIP timeout timer value in seconds expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 1200.
Specifies the RIP flush timer value in seconds expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 1200.
